Introduction

Mingyu is a South Korean singer under Dongyo Entertainment. He is a member of the group DKZ and its sub-unit NINE to SIX.

He made his debut as a member of JTG Boys, JTG Entertainment's forthcoming boy band, on October 8, 2020. He departed prior to the group's subsequent JWiiver debut.

On March 28, 2022, Mingyu along with Sehyeon and Giseok were revealed to be the new members of DKZ. They officially debuted on April 12, 2022 with the single album 'Chase Episode 2. Maum'.

On May 18, 2023, Dongyo Entertainment announced that they will be debuting a sub-unit named NINE to SIX which includes DKZ's members Jonghyeong and Mingyu and they are going to release their unit's debut single album 'Good to You' on May 31.
